content: during the summer i love to drink out of those giant cups with ice inside of them i like my drinks coooooold the only problem is that they drip and sweat everywhere and since their bases are so large most coasters are too small for them i made a coaster for them a while back but my husband stole it and took it to work with him i ve made myself a new set with some leftover cotton and i think it s a safe bet that he won t run off with these
